casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Garland Edward PITTMAN. No. 135P02-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of June 2005 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2005."
